overview: Soccer in the City explores the complicated relationship between America and soccer, focused on the inner cities as the catalyst for growth of the sport - on and off the pitch. Featuring well-known American and international stars, inspiring individuals dedicated to making a difference, and organizations committed to breaking down barriers, Soccer in the City is a powerful, character-driven film, offering hope, inspiration and an embrace of the power of "the beautiful game.
tagline: a character-driven, energetic documentary about the complicated relationship between soccer & American cities
title: Soccer in the City
